revised_title: A Case Study of a Stone Removed from a Horse in Boston, 1724
tldr: In this case study, Dr. Paul Dudley shares the story of a horse in Boston that coughed up a polypus from its windpipe. The polypus was examined and found to be hollow, providing insight into the respiratory system and veterinary medicine of the time.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Veterinary Medicine
